xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} #set ($propertyClass = $object.getxWikiClass().get($name)) #set ($pickerId = "${prefix}${name}") ## ## #if ($type == 'edit') #set($discard = $xwiki.jsfx.use("js/scriptaculous/effects.js")) #set($discard = $xwiki.jsfx.use("js/scriptaculous/dragdrop.js")) ## --------------------------------- ## We load this script non-deferred because we changed the way we setup the ## suggest picker (we do it in the page instead of the jsx), ## so we cannot be sure anymore that the picker is defined by the time it is called in this page, ## as xwiki:dom:loading is fired potentially before the loading of deferred scripts. ## --------------------------------- $xwiki.jsx.use('xwiki:XWiki.SuggestDisplay', {'defer' : false }) $xwiki.ssx.use('xwiki:XWiki.SuggestDisplay', {'minify' : false}) ## render a select with the current selection {{html clean="false"}} #if ($value.size() > 0) #end ## set this variable to force the send of a requester to the suggest vm, to force the generation of the suggestions depending on the current document. Needs support in suggest.vm #if ($needsContextualSuggest) #end ## now display the item in edit mode, to have the suggest and all. $doc.displayEdit($propertyClass, $prefix, $object) ## Save the className and the class property name in hidden picker (In editItemInPopups mode) #if("$!SuggestDisplayItemsEditable" != '' && $SuggestDisplayItemsEditable == true) ## New js/css calls #set($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use("XWiki.SuggestDisplayEditItems")) #set($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use("XWiki.SuggestDisplayEditItems")) #set($attachmentPickerDocName = 'XWiki.AttachmentSelector') #set($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use($attachmentPickerDocName)) #set($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use($attachmentPickerDocName)) ## Wysiwyg #set($lazy = true) #wysiwyg_import($lazy) ## Date picker : TODO #if("$!SuggestDisplayEditModeSpace" != '') #else #end #end ## -------------------------------- ## This multiple suggest feature overwrites simple select suggest ## -> call multi suggest for current obj & prop ## -------------------------------- #if($displayAddButton) #end {{/html}} #else #foreach($v in $value) #if ($propertyClass.getMapValues().containsKey($v)) #set ($title = $propertyClass.getMapValues().get($v).value) #else #set ($title = $v) #end #if($valueIsDoc) ## use html macro to make sure that no wiki syntax is interpreted in the title {{html}}${title}{{/html}} #elseif($valueIsLink || $valueIsExternalLink) [[{{{${title}}}}>>path:${v}#if($valueIsExternalLink)||rel="__blank"#end]] ## --------------------------------- ## users : Display first name and last name instead of username ## --------------------------------- #elseif($isUser) {{html}} #if($isUserWithLink) $xwiki.getUserName($v, true) #else $xwiki.getUserName($v, false) #end{{/html}} #else $title #end #end #end {{/velocity}}
